3. Elon Musk’s upcoming ‘SNL’ hosting gig causes outrage among stars (via Page Six)
4. Kanye West's Yeezys just sold for a record-breaking $1.8 million (via CNN)
5. Golden State Warriors become first pro team to launch NFT collection (via ESPN)
